alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 09 at 10:12AM CDT until April 11 at 11:17PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Alabama River Near Claiborne Dam affecting Clarke, Wilcox and Monroe Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River Near Claiborne Dam. * WHEN...Until late Monday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 44.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 44.2 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 42.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
